message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $12000. I believe it's a great value and I think you'll love it!
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $9500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. It's a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
I understand your perspective, Alice. I am willing to go up to $10500 for the product. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to get the best price for my product. How about we settle on $11500?
